import React from 'react' import Feedback from '../Feedback' function MultipleResults({onCharacterSelected, feedback, characters}) { return
{feedback && } {feedback === null && characters === null && } {characters && characters.map(({id, name, path, extension}) =>
onCharacterSelected(id)} data-id={id} className="column cursor card is-one-third-widescreen is-two-fifths-tablet is-three-quarters-mobile has-text-centered">

{name}

)}
} export default MultipleResults
